attributes.action: Hold an early election to vote for new U.K Government and Prime Minister
attributes.background:
This is a petition to prove that the people of the United Kingdom have no confidence in our current Conservative leadership.
The current system we live under is not working and as citizens of the United Kingdom we are entitled to put in place a government body that respects & represent it's people

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/136763
